title: Get benchmarks for a business category

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by TikTok creators. To obtain an access token, use /tt_user/oauth2/token/ .

parameters.name: business_id
parameters.description: Application specific unique identifier for the TikTok account. Pass the value of the open_id field returned in the response of /tt_user/oauth2/token/ to this field.

parameters.name: business_category
parameters.description: Business category. For enum values, see List of values for business_category . Example: ART_AND_CRAFTS .

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: business_category
fields.description: Business category. Example: Art & Crafts . Note that the value of this field is different from the value of the business_category field in the request.

fields.name: average_likes
fields.description: Average number of likes on owned videos across Business Accounts in the business category. Example: 22618.7106

fields.name: average_comments
fields.description: Average number of comments on owned videos across Business Accounts in the business category. Example: 625.6003

fields.name: average_shares
fields.description: Average number of shares on owned videos across Business Accounts in the business category. Example: 1161.3881

fields.name: average_video_count
fields.description: Average number of videos across Business Accounts in the business category. Example: 138.9494

fields.name: average_follower_count
fields.description: Average number of followers across Business Accounts in the business category. Example: 1592.5344

fields.name: average_follower_growth
fields.description: Average increase in followers over the last 30 days across Business Accounts in business category. Example: 24.9218

fields.name: average_engagement_rate
fields.description: Average engagement rate across Business Accounts in the business category. Example: 0.0449

fields.name: average_video_views
fields.description: Average video views across Business Accounts in the business category. Example: 353527.9227
